categories: Category:Battles in the Allied Tion sector

nodes.text: The Battle of Cadinth was fought between the Kingdom of Cron of Xer and the Three Allied Kingdoms in the Pre-Republic era, at the planet Cadinth.

Following the defeat of King Ferece, Xer installed himself as the new King of Cron and launched a campaign to take control of the Tion Cluster. After have conquered the complete Kingdom of Cron, Xer attacked a trio of allied kingdoms on his rimward flank: Jaminere, Cadinth and Barseg.
